long_description: A grown-up bottle for serious cyclists, the 21 fl. oz. Camelbak Podium(R) Bottle redefines the bike bottle with a a high flow rate and a handy self-sealing cap that lets you sip without spills. Made of medical-grade silicone, the self-sealing JetValve(TM) cap eliminates splatter on your frame and jersey. JetValve lets you sip from any direction or squirt to cool off on long rides; no more "bite-open, hip-slap shut" steps. Squeezable sides provide high flow rates. Made from a proprietary blend of polypropylene with HydroGuard(TM) anitimicrobrial treatment, the Podium lets you taste your drink, not your bottle. Positive shut-off valve on lid provides leakproof transport. Polypropylene is 100% BPA free. Please note: the 21 fl. oz. Camelbak Podium Bottle does not protect user against disease-causing organisms; always wash bottle after use.
short_description: A grown-up bottle for serious cyclists, the 21 fl. oz. Camelbak Podium(R) Bottle redefines the bike bottle with a a high flow rate and a handy self-sealing cap that lets you sip without spills.
